products.name: BUZZ LIGHTYEAR TALKING FIGURE
products.description: Join Buzz Lightyear on his intergalactic adventures! This talking action figure features authentic movie phrases, light-up wings, and articulated joints for dynamic poses. Perfect for imaginative play and Toy Story fans.

products.name: NINJA WARRIOR SET
products.description: Become the ultimate ninja warrior with this complete combat set! Includes realistic ninja weapons, armor pieces, and training accessories. Perfect for role-play and developing coordination skills.

additionalInfo.SET INCLUDES: Ninja sword, Stars, Armor vest, Mask

products.name: DINOSAUR BATTLE PACK
products.description: Unleash prehistoric fun with this realistic dinosaur set! Features articulated joints, realistic textures, and authentic dinosaur sounds. Perfect for imaginative play and learning about prehistoric creatures.

products.name: SPACE EXPLORER KIT
products.description: Embark on an interstellar adventure with this complete space explorer kit! Includes astronaut figure, space vehicle, and cosmic accessories. Features LED lights and realistic space sounds.

products.name: SUPERHERO TEAM PACK
products.description: Assemble your own superhero team with this amazing collection! Each hero features unique powers, costumes, and accessories. Perfect for creating epic adventures and battling villains.

products.name: ROBOT FIGHTER SQUAD
products.description: Build your robot fighting force with these advanced mechanical warriors! Each robot features articulated joints, interchangeable weapons, and unique battle abilities.

products.name: PIRATE ADVENTURE SET
products.description: Set sail for adventure with this complete pirate playset! Includes pirate figures, ship accessories, and treasure items. Perfect for imaginative play and storytelling.

products.name: TRANSFORMING MECH WARRIOR
products.description: Experience the ultimate in transforming action figures! This mech warrior converts from robot to vehicle mode with easy-to-use transformation mechanics. Features light-up elements and battle sounds.

products.name: KNIGHT AND DRAGON PLAYSET
products.description: Enter a world of medieval fantasy with this knight and dragon playset! Features articulated knight figure with armor, fearsome dragon with moving wings, and castle accessories.

products.name: JUNGLE EXPLORER SET
products.description: Discover the wonders of the jungle with this complete explorer set! Includes explorer figure, friendly animal companions, and adventure gear. Perfect for nature-themed imaginative play.

products.name: BABY'S FIRST BLOCKS SET
products.description: Introduce your baby to shapes, colors, and problem-solving with this classic block set. Soft-edged blocks are perfect for little hands and encourage early development of motor skills and spatial awareness.

additionalInfo.EDUCATIONAL VALUE: Shape recognition, Color learning, Motor skills

products.name: STACKING RINGS
products.description: Classic stacking rings toy helps develop hand-eye coordination and size recognition. Each ring features a different texture and color for sensory development.

additionalInfo.DEVELOPMENT AREAS: Motor skills, Color recognition, Size sorting

products.name: MUSICAL XYLOPHONE
products.description: Introduce your toddler to the joy of music with this colorful xylophone. Features perfectly tuned bars that produce clear, pleasant tones. Includes two child-safe mallets for exploring rhythm and melody.

additionalInfo.DEVELOPMENT AREAS: Musical skills, Color matching, Motor coordination

products.name: SOFT BUILDING BLOCKS
products.description: Ultra-soft foam blocks perfect for safe stacking and building. These lightweight blocks are ideal for developing spatial awareness and creative play. Each block features different textures and patterns.

products.name: SHAPE SORTER CUBE
products.description: Classic shape sorting toy with a modern twist. Features 12 different shapes and a sturdy cube with corresponding holes. Each shape makes a satisfying click when correctly inserted.

products.name: TODDLER PUZZLE SET
products.description: Set of 4 wooden puzzles featuring farm animals, vehicles, fruits, and numbers. Each puzzle has large, easy-grip pieces perfect for little hands. Bright colors and simple designs make learning fun.

products.name: PLAY-DOH STARTER PACK
products.description: Classic modeling compound set perfect for creative play. Includes 4 different colors and basic modeling tools. Non-toxic formula stays soft and pliable for hours of creative fun.

products.name: MAGNETIC DRAWING BOARD
products.description: Mess-free drawing board with magnetic pen and stampers. Easy-slide eraser bar quickly clears the screen for endless creative possibilities. Perfect for travel and quiet time activities.

products.name: ACTIVITY CUBE
products.description: Five-sided activity center with different learning activities on each face. Features include bead maze, shape sorter, spinning gears, and musical elements. Perfect for developing multiple skills.

products.name: CHUNKY WOODEN PUZZLE
products.description: Large-piece wooden puzzle featuring friendly zoo animals. Each piece has a large knob for easy gripping. The pieces stand up for additional pretend play possibilities.

products.name: REMOTE CONTROL CAR
products.description: Experience thrilling racing action with this high-speed remote control car! Features all-wheel drive, shock absorption system, and precise controls. Performs amazing stunts and can handle various terrains.

additionalInfo.PACKAGE CONTENTS: RC Car, Remote control, USB charger, Manual

products.name: INTERACTIVE PET ROBOT
products.description: Meet your new robotic pet friend! This interactive robot responds to touch, voice, and movement. Features multiple play modes, emotional responses, and learning capabilities.

additionalInfo.FEATURES: Voice recognition, Touch response, LED eyes
additionalInfo.MAINTENANCE: Easy to clean, Software updates available

products.name: KIDS DIGITAL CAMERA
products.description: Capture memories with this durable, kid-friendly digital camera. Features easy-grip design, preview screen, and fun photo effects. Perfect for developing creativity and digital skills.

additionalInfo.INCLUDES: Camera, SD card, USB cable, Neck strap

products.name: ELECTRONIC DRUM PAD
products.description: Create amazing beats with this electronic drum pad! Features 8 touch-sensitive drum pads, multiple sound effects, and rhythm training modes. Perfect for developing musical skills.

additionalInfo.POWER: AC adapter or 6 x AA batteries

products.name: LEARNING TABLET
products.description: An educational tablet designed specifically for young learners. Features interactive games, learning activities, and parental controls. Helps develop literacy, numeracy, and problem-solving skills.

products.name: VOICE CHANGING MICROPHONE
products.description: Have fun with this voice-changing microphone featuring multiple sound effects and built-in songs. Perfect for karaoke and creative play. Includes LED lights that pulse with the music.

products.name: SMART ROBOT KIT
products.description: Build and program your own robot with this educational STEM kit. Features easy-to-follow instructions, programmable movements, and sensor interactions. Perfect for learning coding basics.

products.name: MUSICAL KEYBOARD
products.description: Introduce your child to music with this colorful electronic keyboard. Features 37 keys, multiple instrument sounds, and teaching modes. Perfect for developing musical skills and creativity.

additionalInfo.POWER: AC adapter or 4 x C batteries

products.name: INTERACTIVE GLOBE
products.description: Explore the world with this interactive talking globe! Features touch-sensitive surface, detailed maps, and thousands of facts about countries, cultures, and wildlife.

additionalInfo.POWER: AC adapter or 4 x C batteries
additionalInfo.INCLUDES: Globe, AC adapter, Quick start guide

products.name: CODING ROBOT
products.description: Learn coding basics with this friendly programmable robot! Features intuitive card-based programming, multiple sensors, and engaging challenges. Perfect for developing logical thinking and problem-solving skills.

products.name: MAGNETIC LETTERS SET
products.description: Complete set of magnetic uppercase and lowercase letters. Perfect for letter recognition, spelling, and early reading skills. Includes magnetic board and activity cards.

products.name: SCIENCE EXPERIMENT KIT
products.description: Explore the world of science with 20 safe and exciting experiments. Includes all necessary equipment and detailed instruction cards. Perfect for developing scientific thinking and observation skills.

products.name: WORLD MAP PUZZLE
products.description: Large floor puzzle featuring detailed world map with countries, capitals, and landmarks. Each piece is shaped like a country or region. Includes fact booklet about different cultures.

products.name: MATH LEARNING CUBE
products.description: Interactive cube with number recognition, counting, and basic math operations. Features light-up buttons and encouraging sound effects. Perfect for developing early math skills.

products.name: MICROSCOPE SET
products.description: Real working microscope with up to 400x magnification. Includes prepared slides and tools for creating your own specimens. Perfect for exploring the microscopic world.

products.name: LANGUAGE LEARNING CARDS
products.description: Double-sided flash cards featuring common words in English and Spanish. Includes phonetic pronunciation guide and colorful illustrations. Perfect for early language learning.

products.name: SOLAR SYSTEM MODEL
products.description: Motorized solar system model with painted planets and LED sun. Demonstrates planetary orbits and includes detailed space fact book. Perfect for astronomy education.

products.name: ANATOMY PUZZLE
products.description: Layered puzzle showing human body systems including skeletal, muscular, and organ systems. Each layer reveals new details about human anatomy. Educational and engaging.

products.name: COUNTING ABACUS
products.description: Classic wooden abacus with colorful beads. Perfect for teaching counting, addition, and subtraction. Features sturdy construction and smooth-sliding beads.

products.name: CHEMISTRY SET
products.description: Complete chemistry set with real lab equipment and safe chemicals. Perform 40+ exciting experiments with detailed instructions. Perfect for budding scientists.

products.name: WOODEN TRAIN SET
products.description: Extensive wooden railway set with tracks, trains, buildings, and accessories. Compatible with major wooden train brands. Perfect for imaginative play and motor skill development.

products.name: POLICE CAR SET
products.description: Realistic police car with working lights and sirens. Includes police officer figures and accessories. Features durable construction and easy-grip design.

products.name: CONSTRUCTION VEHICLE SET
products.description: Set of 4 construction vehicles including dump truck, excavator, crane, and bulldozer. Each vehicle features moving parts and realistic details.

products.name: RACING CAR TRACK
products.description: Exciting racing track with loops, jumps, and electronic lap counter. Includes two racing cars with LED lights. Features easy assembly and storage.

products.name: FIRE TRUCK DELUXE
products.description: Large fire truck with extending ladder, water cannon, and realistic sounds. Includes firefighter figures and rescue accessories. Perfect for role-play scenarios.

products.name: AIRPLANE PLAYSET
products.description: Commercial airplane playset with removable roof, detailed interior, and working features. Includes passenger figures and airport accessories.

products.name: MONSTER TRUCK
products.description: Rugged monster truck with oversized wheels and suspension system. Features pull-back motor action and durable construction for intense play.

products.name: CARGO SHIP SET
products.description: Detailed cargo ship with working crane and containers. Features floating design and removable cargo sections. Perfect for water play and logistics learning.

products.name: SUBWAY TRAIN SET
products.description: Modern subway train set with track pieces and station. Features working doors and authentic subway sounds. Includes passengers and station accessories.

products.name: HELICOPTER RESCUE
products.description: Rescue helicopter with working rotor, winch, and searchlight. Features realistic sound effects and rescue accessories. Perfect for emergency service role-play.
